FuncDef: The display rawlink status command displays information about IPv4 RawLink connections.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about the RawLink connection with a specified APP CID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to ffffffff.

Displays information about the RawLink connection with a specified socket ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 2147418111.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Run the display rawlink status command to check the following information about each valid IPv4 RawLink connection on a device:
RawLink socket IDAPP CID
No information is displayed if there is no RawLink connection on the device.
